title.rendered: Top 5 destinations to enjoy summer in October

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]October is the perfect time of the year to travel somewhere. Life goes back to normal after the summer rush, so the holiday destinations are less crowded. You can enjoy your getaway in peace, try fantastic cuisines, drink great wines, discover the hidden gems.

We have collected our 5 favorite places, where you can still enjoy the warm weather in October. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”23193″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”171346″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Azores, Portugal


Azores, an extraordinarily beautiful group of islands, are known for their breathtaking landscapes, beautiful and rich culture and wide range of activity possibilities, including the discovery of the UNESCO Heritage Sites. For more than 500 years, the nine widely dispersed islands floating in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean, have remained almost untouched.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Marrakech, Morocco

Marrakesh, the former imperial city of western Morocco, is now a major economic center. Its mosques, palaces, gardens, mazelike alleys and its marketplaces with shimmering colors and oriental scents, are a magical world. The city offers unique pieces, whether traditional textiles, ceramics or jewelry. Immerse yourself in the architectural richness of this beautiful and vibrant city.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”23218″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”743222″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”23203″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”442160″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Paphos, Cyprus

Paphos, located on the southwest coast of the Mediterranean island of Cyprus, has so much to discover. Known as the city of Aphrodite, Paphos has become a modern yet charming town with seaside promenades, bars and tavernas. Its ancient monuments, beaches and the nearby natural attractions are the main reasons for visiting. In the UNESCO ‘Paphos Archaeological Park’ you can lose yourself in the history surrounding you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Formentera, Spain

The beautiful island of Formentera is the smallest of Spain’s Balearic Islands, considered one of the last paradises of the Mediterranean. A 19 km long island with its unspoiled nature, idyllic white sandy beaches, incredible shades of blue sea, historical villages and nice restaurants. Formentera is known as a safe sailing area due to the all-year-long good sailing conditions.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”23208″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”186023″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image media=”23213″ media_width_percent=”100″ uncode_shortcode_id=”194138″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Luxor, Egypt

Luxor is a worldwide known, magical city in Upper Egypt. It is the home of intact ancient Egyptian temples that date back almost 4,000 years. Luxor alone has one-third of the world’s ancient monuments such as the Valley of Kings, Karnak Temple or Luxor Temple. You can discover a wide range of ancient monasteries, graves, temples, and several monuments that attract visitors from all around the world to Luxor.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Book your jet now and pack your bags![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: October is the perfect time of the year to travel somewhere. Life goes back to normal after the summer rush, so the holiday destinations are less crowded. You can enjoy your getaway in peace, try fantastic cuisines, drink great wines, discover the hidden gems. We have collected our 5 favorite places, where you can still enjoy the warm weather in October.
